name: SHINOBI INSTINCT
description:
2 Shinobis fight to the death in the dark, having to rely on their ears, or the light of the swords of their opponent.

In this 1vs1 fighting game, face your friend in a small space immerged in the dark and try to emerge victorious in multiple battles to decide who is the strongest warrior in the shadows.

Controls :
This game can be played with PS4 or a Xbox One controllers, or with a keyboard.
The game is for 2 players only.
A match ends when a player wins 5 rounds, meaning he killed his opponent 5 times. A match can last 5 to 9 rounds.
To click on Buttons, use your mouse.
To play with the characters, use your Controllers (PS4/Xbox) or your keyboard.

This game was made by students Flavien CARPENTIER, Alexandre CASTRO, Quentin SATTLER and Paul-Enzo Serero, with the help of James GLENISTER for the music.
